SEARCH
Package src.model

Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
src.model.Payment
src.model.Invoice
public class Invoice extends Payment
Represents an invoice, extending the Payment class to include housing-specific fields such as the applicant's NRIC, project name, and flat type. Used to track payment-related information for BTO bookings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Invoice

      public Invoice(int paymentId, double amount, LocalDate date, PaymentMethod method, String status, String applicantNRIC, String projectName, String flatType)
      Constructs an Invoice with all relevant details.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - Unique ID for this invoice/payment.
      amount - Total amount to be paid.
      date - Date the invoice was generated.
      method - Payment method used (can be null if not paid yet).
      status - Current payment status (e.g., "Awaiting Payment", "Processed").
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant responsible for this invoice.
      projectName - Name of the housing project this invoice applies to.
      flatType - Flat type associated with this invoice.

  • Method Details

    • generateInvoice

      public String generateInvoice()
      Generates a detailed string representation of the invoice.
      Returns:
      Formatted invoice details including project, flat type, amount, and payment status.

    • getApplicantNRIC

      public String getApplicantNRIC()

      Applicant NRIC.

    • getProjectName

      public String getProjectName()
      Returns the name of the project this invoice is for.
      Returns:
      Project name.

    • getFlatType

      public String getFlatType()
      Returns the flat type (e.g., 2-Room, 3-Room) this invoice is for.
      Returns:
      Flat type.
